sentences.english: The development of the 4th edition of the "A guide to the Core Journal of China" is in progress.
sentences.chinese: 第四版《中文核心期刊要目总览》正在研制当中。

sentences.english: Animal Science Department University of Kentucky . Poultry Program Overview and Course Descriptions.
sentences.chinese: 肯塔基大学畜产系，家禽计划总览与课程概述。

sentences.english: If you put the three together you understand the worries.
sentences.chinese: 如果你总览这三点你就会明白我们的担心所在。

sentences.english: Offer an overview of your site with a TOC or site map.
sentences.chinese: 使用目录或者站点地图为你的站点提供一个总览。

sentences.english: The overview gives a quick overall view of your content.
sentences.chinese: 在总览中，你可以快速综览所有内容。

sentences.english: You can provide employees and supervisors with planning overviews.
sentences.chinese: 你可以预备员工和计划管理总览。

sentences.english: The overview screen will be displayed.
The overview screen contains a link on the bottom left that will take you to the source.
sentences.chinese: 总览屏幕包括左下角可以转向源代码的链接。

definition: to take a broad view of sth
to explain in detail/detailed answer/full solution (to a math problem)
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report/also written 匯總|汇总
summary/to summarize/to collect (data, receipts etc)/to gather and report
to outline/to summarize/to sketch/summary/brief description/concise narrative/in a nutshell/briefly
to look at sth through a bamboo tube/to have a restricted view
